queries.description: Student residence at the Technical University of Crete (TUC), Greece. The building is a three-floor complex with 20 en-suite student rooms and a shared kitchen on each floor. Each room has an independent split air conditioner and a smart thermostat with built-in temperature and occupancy.
queries.retrieved_information: Zone's IFC reference and timeseries ID of the maximum air temperature setpoint of each zone

questions.text: For each zone, what is the timeseries ID of its maximum air temperature setpoint, and what is the zone’s IFC reference?
What are the zone IDs and the timeseries IDs of the maximum air temperature setpoints that are located in spaces belonging to each zone?
For each zone, what is its external IFC reference name and which timeseries ID holds its maximum air temperature setpoint?
Can you list every zone’s name along with the identifier of the timeseries that records its highest temperature setpoint?
Which zones map to which data series for their peak temperature settings?
What are the maximum temperature setpoints for each zone?

queries.retrieved_information: Zone's IFC reference and timeseries ID of the minimum air temperature setpoint of each zone

questions.text: For each zone, what is the timeseries ID of its minimum air temperature setpoint, and what is the zone’s IFC reference?

Which zones have a minimum air temperature setpoint sensor in their spaces and what are those zones’ IFC names along with the sensor’s timeseries ID?

Where can I find the timeseries identifiers for the minimum temperature settings in each building zone and the names of those zones?

questions.text: For each zone, what is the timeseries ID of its occupancy sensor, and what is the zone’s IFC reference?
What is the IFC name of each zone and the timeseries id from the external reference of the occupancy sensor that is located in a space which is part of that zone?
For each zone identified by its IFC name, which timeseries id is linked to the occupancy sensor installed in one of its spaces via the sensor’s external reference?
Which zones, by their IFC names, contain occupancy sensors in their spaces and what are the sensors’ timeseries ids?
List each zone name along with the data stream id of the occupancy sensor monitoring that zone.
How can I retrieve occupancy sensor time series data for every zone in the building?
